Text: TaleSpin:  The two words in the show's name, "tale" and "spin", are a way to describe telling a story.

Text: TaleSpin:  The show is one of the nine "Disney Afternoon" shows to use established Disney characters as the main characters, with the others being "Darkwing Duck", "DuckTales", "Chip 'n Dale Rescue Rangers", "Goof Troop", "Bonkers", "Quack Pack", "Aladdin" and "Timon & Pumbaa".
